transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: Haan ji Simran mam baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ji ji mam Govind baat kar raha tha main account manager GD agency catalog zinda hai na mam aapka?
Customer: Haan haan sir aap alag alag zara number se phone karte ho hamesha.
Executive: Mam mera ek hi number hai.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Nahi nahi aap wo na actually mera number to personal to dusra hai fir ye kya hota hai kai baar call lagate hain na to aapke ye jo hamara ek DID number hota hai ek to uske through jati hai to ye alag number show hota hoga aapko waise mera number dusra hai.
Executive: To abhi jaise main isliye phone kar raha tha last time baat hua tha to aapne matlab wo naam change karke dal di medicine jaise aap keh rahe the anti depression anti anxiety type test karke.
Customer: Haan sir dal to di par response nahi aa raha koi khas.
Executive: Achcha calls bhi nahi aa rahi.
Executive: Haan mam calls to ye hai na ki calls aapko 90 dinon mein 138 call aayi to hai matlab aise par 50% hi receive hui hai usme se.
Customer: Haan sir aise hi pata nahi mere paas to call nahi aati pata nahi aapko kahan dikhate rehte hain mujhe to ye nahi samajh aati.
Executive: Nahi mam dekho ye chart hai main chahe aapko ek bari video meet karke dikha sakta hun ye na aisa hua hai ki aapke do number lag rahe hain ek to yahi wala hai aur ek 732 hai.
Customer: To usko hataun kya dono hatana padega na fir wo phone number.
Executive: Hai na 732 kiska number hai?
Customer: Pata nahi.
Executive: Achcha ek number hai aapka primary number hai 83 se start hai jiske last mein 732 hai mam.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Hai na to Simran mam aisa rehta hai ki aap samajhiye ki 17 se 23 august ke beech mein bhi aapko 23 call aayi hai jisme se 18 call miss ho gayi hai hamari.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Theek hai aur aapko like aap samajhiye ki 7 se 13 ke beech mein 7 tarikh se 13 september ke beech mein bhi aapko lagbhag 26 call yahan pe dikh raha hai mere ko aur 13 call miss ho gaya hai to mam ho sakta hai shayad us wale number pe rehta ho aapke number pe rehta ho kyunki bajte to dono ek sath hi ring hote hain matlab call hai na.
Customer: Sir mere pass to number hi change hai.
Executive: Haan ya to number change karwa lo aur teen number hai dekho yahan pe to ek to 732 hai last mein ek 572 hai 98 se start hai number aapka aur ek number ye hai 62 jiske last mein 734 hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai to ye hai mam aur usme se ye hai na ki dekho call aapko aa to rahi hai like ab ye hai na ki abhi filhal beech mein kya hua hai ki aapke jaise pehle product dal rakhe the na to wo aapko ek dam se restructure karna pada hoga sare cheeze.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Hai na to aapne kaise karke dala hai matlab usme aapne naam kya dala hai category mil gayi thi anti depression aur anti uski.
Customer: Haan sir wohi dali hai but abhi uska response nahi aa raha koi khas.
Executive: Haan mam Simran mam main bhi yahi soch raha tha kyunki aapke nau hi product abhi active rahe hain ATI karke hai aapka clone.
Customer: [inaudible] kya kare agar proper naam dalte hain to ud jati hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: To aap [inaudible]
Customer: [inaudible] kya kare na to India mart chhodne ko man kar raha hai na isko lene ka man kar raha hai bahut.
Executive: Nahi mam Simran mam dekho chhod ke to ye aap suniye government ki policy hai agar India mart to agar allow karta na agar government allow karti to hamari side se to kuch nahi hai hum to aapko karne dete yahan pe us cheez mein trading jo bhi aapka hai na business ab mam ye hai na wo upar se hi ban ho gaye hain is vajah se thoda sa dikkat aa raha hai baki aap dekho chhodo mat mujhe mujhe lagta hai India mart ke alava kisi aur platform pe hai business aapki?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Nahi hai na wohi to matlab ye hai ki kam se kam aap hume jarurat hi nahi thi kahin aur na humne dekha.
Customer: Wohi wohi.
Executive: Wohi mam to dekho mam karwaungi main renew to karwaungi ek bar par fir wohi karwaungi ab normal wala hi karwaungi abhi dekhungi fir uske baad beech mein agar mere ko laga achcha response hai fir bade dusra le lenge beech mein beech mein le sakte hain na.
Executive: Haan le sakte hain abhi bhi achcha deal chal raha hai like agar aapko jaise pata hoga na ek to aapka normal mein chal raha hai to jaise aap bade package pe kehte hain wo trust seal ka rehta hai theek hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ek ek step aage usme kya yahan pe 17 valid mil rahi hai usme 34 milti hai aapko valid double ho jati hai aur upar se ye hai na ki aapke visheshkar ko Punjab ke level pe is tarah se aur all India level pe na visibility increase ho jati hai to jis se direct kya hai ki direct caller inquiries ka response badh jayega aapko.
Customer: Sir wo to mujhe pehle dekh liya bas mere ko wo chahiye abhi nahi karungi main abhi to main dekho aap wohi wohi main samajh raha hun aap educated ho aapko sari cheeze pata hai matlab aapko bata rakhi hai pehle se bhi account manager vagera jo bhi honge to ye hai ki aap dekh lijiyega matlab ye hai na ki chhod ke to koi fayda hai nahi mam main bataun dekho cheez hai ki aapke kisi aur platform pe visibility aani aur jo main ye keh raha hun na kam se kam aap dekho 90 dinon mein 500 to inquiry generate bhi hui hai shayad jo pehle catalog mein product dal rakhe honge na to uske time pe hua ho aur 138 call aayi bhi hai to aap thoda sa na in pe dekh lo ki ab ye hai ki mam jo medicine matlab aap samajh rahe ho jiska vyapar ho sake agar wo aap dal do to to automatically aane lagengi to yahi hai mam meri side se to ye kyunki abhi nau product hai aapke to product count kya hua decrease ho gaya ek dam se.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hai na to ab aap aisi medicine dal do matlab hame to itni matlab bilkul kya hai na ki bilkul technical jankari kya hai na ki wo medicine dalte ho na to uske to hame waise hi order aate hain wo to company humse humse order bhi nahi deti wo.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: To kya hai ki mere paas leads aayi na usi ke aane lag jati hai.
Customer: Samajh gaya samajh gaya.
Customer: Haan tabhi isliye nahi dal rahi main.
Executive: Achcha koi nahi to dekho mam [inaudible] dalungi.
Customer: Wohi wohi koi nahi main na aapko apne number se ek bari message kar deta hun to na aap mera number save kar lo aur ek bari na mam aap na video meet pe connect ho ja rahe to main aapko thoda dikha bhi dunga ki at least ha sach mein itni call aa rahi hai miss ho rahi hai to aap thoda sa dekh ke samajh ke aur matlab aap aap apni side se hi bataiye matlab kis tarah se isko kare kya product dalen matlab kya cheeze agar aage hai na.
Customer: Chalo theek hai fir kisi time aayenge aap.
Executive: Haan ji theek theek hai mam theek theek.
Customer: Okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting good response.

- Customer is not receiving calls.



Resolution:

- Executive informed about calls and missed calls.

- Executive suggested to change the number.

- Executive offered a video meet.



Next Steps: 

- Customer agreed to connect on video meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, product, calls
